article_text: Changemakers can come from anywhere, including the corporate world. Just look at Maria Escorcia, director of the South Florida chapter of Ashoka, a nonprofit that supports a network of 3,000 social entrepreneurs around the world.

article_metadata.title: Q&A with Ashoka’s Maria Escorcia: Boosting entrepreneurship for social change | Miami Herald

article_summary:
Just look at Maria Escorcia, director of the South Florida chapter of Ashoka, a nonprofit that supports a network of 3,000 social entrepreneurs around the world.
Changemakers can come from anywhere, including the corporate world.
